You can be provided data in the form of xml, table, meaning representations, graphs etc.

final_response: Abdul Taib Mahmud is affiliated with the Parti Pesaka Bumiputera Bersatu and resides at Demak Jaya, Jalan Bako, Kuching, Sarawak.
